unnormalised: **Auto Buzz: New Wheels Hit the Indian Roads!**
normalised: **Auto Buzz: New Wheels Hit the Indian Roads!**

unnormalised: Namaste auto enthusiasts! This week’s been a scorcher for vehicle launches. Mahindra pulled a rabbit out of the hat with their new Thar EV concept showcased at the Dr. Ambedkar International Centre in Delhi. Looks like they’re aiming for the eco-conscious crowd, promising a range of over 450 km on a single charge.
normalised: Namaste auto enthusiasts! This week’s been a scorcher for vehicle launches. Mahindra pulled a rabbit out of the hat with their new Thar E V concept showcased at the Doctor Ambedkar International Centre in Delhi. Looks like they’re aiming for the eco-conscious crowd, promising a range of over four hundred and fifty kilometer on a single charge.

unnormalised: Meanwhile, Maruti Suzuki finally unveiled the much-awaited Jimny 5-door! Bookings are already overflowing, and reports suggest a waiting period stretching into next year. Competition is heating up in the compact SUV segment, folks!
normalised: Meanwhile, Maruti Suzuki finally unveiled the much-awaited Jimny five-door! Bookings are already overflowing, and reports suggest a waiting period stretching into next year. Competition is heating up in the compact S U V segment, folks!

unnormalised: And hold your horses, Tata Motors also dropped a teaser for a new SUV, codenamed 'Blackbird.' Speculations are rife it'll be a direct competitor to the Hyundai Creta.
normalised: And hold your horses, Tata Motors also dropped a teaser for a new S U V, codenamed 'Blackbird.' Speculations are rife it'll be a direct competitor to the Hyundai Creta.

unnormalised: In other news, Hero MotoCorp launched a spruced-up version of their Splendor, adding a digital console and more chrome - shiny! Prices start at Rs. 75,000 ex-showroom. Plus, a new EV scooter startup, "Bijli Bikes," announced plans to set up a manufacturing unit in Pune, aiming for a 50,000 sq ft facility. Buckle up, it’s gonna be a wild ride!
normalised: In other news, Hero MotoCorp launched a spruced-up version of their Splendor, adding a digital console and more chrome - shiny! Prices start at rupee seventy five thousand ex-showroom. Plus, a new E V scooter startup, "Bijli Bikes," announced plans to set up a manufacturing unit in Pune, aiming for a fifty thousand square foot facility. Buckle up, it’s gonna be a wild ride!
